Now we are going to compile a full c app, that uses the library we just compiled. It will ask for some input and then print it back.
 
 Check out the Makefile..
 
 # cat Makefile
 
 I have included ~/local/include and -lmyfunc will load libmyfunc.so, and later look for it in the $LD_LIBRARY_PATH
 
 # make
 
 And then run it.. 
 
 # ./tester
 
 Or you can install it for use anywhere..
 
 # make install
 
 Now you can run it from any folder, with just 'tester' not './tester', as ~/local/bin is in your $PATH
 
 And that - is that :-)
